m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Rises Today on Strong First Quarter Vehicle Deliveries - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Rises Today on Strong First Quarter Vehicle Deliveries By Tony Owusu | 04/06/15 - 09:49 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) shares are up 4.67% to $199.92 in early market trading on Monday after the electric vehicle maker reported its highest quarterly delivery total ever of over 10,000 vehicles in the period. The Elon Musk led company announced that it delivered a total of 10,030 vehicles during the first three months of the year, 50 vehicles ahead of its original forecast for the quarter and 55% more than the same period la
